title: ISic020029. ISic020029
body:
1+

1+

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Agostiniani 1977 (IAS I)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

Cross-shaped sign recurrent as a mark throughout the ancient world. Cf. Agostiniani 1977, p.11, which reports some parallels with Attic ceramic: Graef, Langlotz 1933, p.128, no.1523, N 456; Milne 1936, fig. 34, no.14; F.Xanthos IV, p.174, nos. 400-401.

Other signs of difficult interpretation graffiti on the lower surface (Lejeune 1970 sees a lambda and an upsilon)

bibliography

  • Tusa 1966 no.30a-b https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001539

  • Milne 1936 fig. 34, no.14 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002564
  • Metzger 1972 p.174, nos. 400-401 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001748
